channel.title: Help! Client null detected?
channel.description:
I have been having problems connecting to my own server. It happens with all three of my computers (even the one I host it on) and I have tried my client and moparscape client. Nothing works. So I'm pretty sure it's server side rather then client.
I run my server, then login (yes my port if forwarded) and I have a no-ip (lanthusscape2.no-ip.info) It then says connecting to server but on my command prompt it says
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/sqjvro.png[/img]
help!

item.title: Help! Client null detected?
item.dc:creator: @Lanthus20 Lanthus20
item.description:
@Lanthus20 wrote:

I have been having problems connecting to my own server. It happens with all three of my computers (even the one I host it on) and I have tried my client and moparscape client. Nothing works. So I’m pretty sure it’s server side rather then client.
